hero.title: Beyond the Square and Compass
hero.subtitle: Developing our character and serving the greater good.

welcome.lodgeName: Goodwood Lodge No. 159, GRQ, A.F. & A.M.
welcome.description: We are a fraternal organization dedicated to making good men better through brotherhood, charity, and personal growth.
welcome.extendedDescription: Located in the heart of Richmond, Ontario, our lodge has been a cornerstone of brotherhood and charitable work for generations. We are proud to be part of the Grand Lodge of A.F. & A.M. of Canada in the Province of Ontario.

values.heading: Step Into Freemasonry
values.description: Freemasonry is built upon a foundation of timeless values that shape our character and guide our actions. These principles are not merely words, but a way of life for every Mason.

brotherlyLove.title: Brotherly Love
brotherlyLove.description: We value respect, freedom, kindness, tolerance, and strive for harmony in our communities.

relief.title: Relief
relief.description: We support those in need through charitable works, community service, and compassion for all.

truth.title: Truth
truth.description: We pursue knowledge, integrity, and moral excellence through self-improvement and enlightenment.

history.title: Our History
history.description: The rich history of Goodwood Lodge No. 159

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.noEvents: No upcoming events at this time.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Interested in learning more about Freemasonry?
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message. We will be in touch soon.
